name: Level -4
description:
You find yourself in an underground laboratory. You must find the way out while avoiding what ever was left down here.
--------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:
We recommend using a mouse
"WASD" to move
"SHIFT" to run
"Spacebar" to jump
"F" to interact
--------------------------------------------------------------
Songs and some sound effects were created by
Úlfur Ingólfsson
